package.name: PDO_OCI
package.summary: Oracle Call Interface driver for PDO
package.description: This extension provides an Oracle driver for PDO.
package.notes:
- Added support for BINARY_DOUBLE and BINARY_FLOAT to PDO_OCI and OCI8 (also fixes bug #36764). (Tony) - Fixed bug #35907 (PDO_OCI uses hardcoded lib path $ORACLE_HOME/lib). (Tony) - Repackage with package2.xml - Improved handling of long columns - Fixed PECL Bug #5722; implemented LOB support.
You require Oracle OCI 8 or higher client libraries (instantclient is also supported) installed on the machine where you intend to build and/or use this package.
If you are running on windows, you can download the binary from here: http://pecl4win.php.net/ext.php/php_pdo_oci.dll
